amendment.description: Amendment adjusts funding for Congressional Printing and Binding under the GPO to address the availability of pocket versions of the United States Constitution for members of the House.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-518 to adjust funding for Congressional Printing and Binding under the GPO to address the availability of pocket versions of the United States Constitution for members of the House. Currently the House has no additional pocket constitutions for members to disburse to their constituents.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
